div.h2: Schools Closed Remainder of 2019-20 School Year

div.div:
ALL SCHOOL BUILDINGS WILL BE CLOSED THE REMAINDER OF THE 2019-20 SCHOOL YEAR. Click here for more information regarding COVID-19.
